author: Maria Elia
method: Place all of the ingredients except the coriander in a saucepan and bring to the boil. Simmer for 10-12 minutes, or until the rice is tender, adding more water if necessary.  Stir in the coriander and spoon into bowls to serve.
ingredients: 150g/5½ oz basmati rice,  200ml/7fl oz water,  200ml/7fl oz coconut milk,  1 handful pak choi stalks, chopped,  ½ red chilli, chopped,  ½ tsp salt,  3 tbsp chopped fresh coriander
